Room.Name: Dryfus' Elephant Leather Works
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Dryfus' Imported Leather Shop, catering to smaller races.
Room.LongDescription: Dryfus' Elephant Leather Works is one of the few dwarven-owned businesses in Oceancrest. There isn't much of a demand for smaller-sized armors, but Dryfus carries most styles. The Elephant Leather is twice as strong as regular leather armor, and usually lasts quite a bit longer as well. The light leather armor is also custom made for dwarves, gnomes and halfings, and lasts significantly longer than standard leather armor.
